fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- In the day, play a Role Card in order to take its goal as your own.
- In the night, play a Role Card in order to use one of its abilities of your choice.
- At any time, choose a Role Card to discard with no effect.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, you will draw 5 random Role Cards, which are simply random Roles in Card form.
- At the start of each day after the first, you will draw another random Role Card.
- You may use multiple abilities per night, as long as you have cards left to play.
- You may only choose a goal twice in a game. If you choose a second goal, it will completely replace the first goal. Your first goal will be unattainable and voided, even if you reached it previously.
- Once you play a Card, you must discard it from your hand.
- You cannot draw a copy of any Card that you have already drawn.
- You cannot draw Cards of Roles that cannot be copied from.
- This role cannot be copied or stolen from.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Obtain a goal from a role card and fulfill that goal.
